body: so . . . she ( he ) just turn MC into a shota ? so she ( he ) enjoy to be a girl , i see , she ( he ) " come out " , noice!

Cool, I think they will both return to normal if they use a Human Effigy From Dark Souls II: Scholar of the First Sin or Reverse Hollowing at a Bonfire in Dark Souls: Prepare To Die Edition, but that also requires atleast one Soft Humanity, which can be gained from using a Humanity or Twin Humanity, killing another player in Player Versus Player Combat, or rarely from an enemy in Player Versus Enemy Combat.
